mapper.insert: insert into t_memo( memo_no, user_no, content, pos_x, pos_y ) values ( seq_t_memo_no.nextVal, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{posX}, #{posY} )
mapper.select: select memo_no as memoNo, user_no as userNo, content, pos_x as posX, pos_y as posY from t_memo
mapper.update: update t_memo set user_no = #{userNo}, content = #{content}, pos_x = #{posX}, pos_y = #{posY} where memo_no = #{memoNo}
